ygData.subject: Re: najena faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Unless it has been changed in the past week, the Undead Knight has no faction. After killing him when he attacked me, we received no faction adjustments at
ygData.messageBody:
Unless it has been changed in the past week, the
Undead Knight has no faction.
After killing him when he attacked me, we received no
faction adjustments at all.
But that was before the last patch, which seemed to
have fixed the bug where he attacked when you were
fighting anything in Najena.
Last night we went in there to get a friend the
gaunlets. The Undead Knight stayed put this time while
we smacked around Drelzna and her necro buddies.

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...> wrote:
> luckily, the undead knight (the guy who makes shadow
> knight armor) has
> temple of solusek ro faction, NOT najena faction. so
> you can kill stuff in
> najena to your hearts content and he'll still like
> you. HOWEVER, since he
> appears in drelzna's room... it would be nice to
> have high najena faction so
> you can survive the trip down there a bit more
> easily!
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
>
>
